    org.opencastproject.mediapackage.MediaPackage.getContributors()
    This is not guaranteed to be correct. Use the metadata contained in the Dublin Core catalog instead.

    This is not guaranteed to be correct. Use the metadata contained in the Dublin Core catalog instead.

    org.opencastproject.util.data.Collections.filter(M, Predicate<A>)
    use Monadics
    org.opencastproject.util.data.Collections.map(Collection<A>, M, Function<A, B>)
    use Monadics
    org.opencastproject.util.data.Collections.map(Collection<A>, Function<A, B>)
    use Monadics
    org.opencastproject.util.data.Collections.mkList(List<A>)
    use Collections.nullToNil(java.util.List)
    org.opencastproject.util.data.Option.error(String)
    use Option.orError(Throwable) or Option.orElse(Function0) instead since it saves the need for creating new objects just for the sake of type soundness. Java unfortunately lacks a bottom type.
    org.opencastproject.util.EqualsUtil.eq(Object, Object)
    org.opencastproject.util.EqualsUtil.eqListSorted(List<?>, List<?>)
    use EqualsUtil.eqObj(Object, Object) or List.equals(Object)
    org.opencastproject.util.EqualsUtil.eqMap(Map<?, ?>, Map<?, ?>)
    use EqualsUtil.eqObj(Object, Object) or Map.equals(Object)
    org.opencastproject.util.EqualsUtil.eqObj(Object, Object)
    org.opencastproject.util.EqualsUtil.hash(Object...)
    org.opencastproject.util.IoSupport.readFileFromURL(URL)
    this method doesn't support UTF8 or handle HTTP response codes
    org.opencastproject.util.IoSupport.readFileFromURL(URL, TrustedHttpClient)
    this method doesn't support UTF8 or handle HTTP response codes
    org.opencastproject.util.IoSupport.withStream(OutputStream, Function<OutputStream, A>)
    use IoSupport.withResource(java.io.Closeable, org.opencastproject.util.data.Function) instead
    org.opencastproject.util.IoSupport.withStream(Function0<InputStream>, Function<Exception, Err>, Function<InputStream, A>)
    use IoSupport.withResource(org.opencastproject.util.data.Function0, org.opencastproject.util.data.Function, org.opencastproject.util.data.Function) instead
    org.opencastproject.util.JsonObj.get(Class<A>, String)
     
    org.opencastproject.util.JsonObj.getObj(String)
     
    org.opencastproject.util.JsonObj.opt(Class<A>, String)
     
    org.opencastproject.util.JsonObj.optObj(String)
     
    org.opencastproject.util.MimeType.asString()
    use MimeType.toString() instead
    org.opencastproject.util.PathSupport.concat(String[])
    Use Java's native 
    Paths.get(String, …).toFile()
    instead
    org.opencastproject.util.PathSupport.concat(String, String)
    Use Java's native 
    Paths.get(String, …).toFile()
    instead
    org.opencastproject.util.PathSupport.path(String...)
    org.opencastproject.util.RestUtil.getResponseFormat(String)
    use RestUtil.getResponseType(String)
    org.opencastproject.util.RestUtil.streamResponse(InputStream, String, Option<Long>, Option<String>)
    use RestUtil.R.ok(java.io.InputStream, String, org.opencastproject.util.data.Option, org.opencastproject.util.data.Option) instead
